name: 楊侑倫
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。材料一般性質之介紹、化學對材料性質的影響、原子在晶體內的堆積方式及 X 光繞射、固體內原子排列的不規則性和原子擴散、固體傳導電子特性、凝固的各種物理性質、相金屬和有關的各種機械性質、鋼鐵材料及其應用。
Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor
General Properties of Materials, Chemical Effects to Material Properties, Atomic Packing Types in Crystals and X-ray Diffraction, Imperfections of Atomic Arrangement in Solids and Atomic Diffusion, Conduction of Electrons in Solids, Solidification, Physical Properties, Metals and their Mechanical Properties, Ferrous Materials and their Applications.
schedule:
第 1 週 Introduction/ Design thinking
第 2 週 Type of materials
第 3 週 Atomic Structure and Bonding
第 4 週 Crystalline Structure and Imperfections
第 5 週 Crystallography

第 6 週 第一次期中考

第 7 週 Dislocation dynamics
第 8 週 Strengthening Mechanisms
第 9 週 Mechanical properties (Plasticity)
第 10 週 Mechanical properties (Plasticity, Fracture)
第 11 週 Processes and Properties (Creep, Fatigue)

第 12 週 第二次期中考

第 13 週 Diffusion in Solid
第 14 週 Phase diagrams
第 15 週 Phase Transformations (general overview)
第 16 週 Phase Transformations of steel
scorePolicy:
1st Midterm Exam (25%, Close Book test)
2nd Midterm Exam (25%, Close Book test)
Final Exam (30%, Close Book test)
平時考 / 點名 (20%)
materials: Materials Science and Engineering, by Ccallister and Rethwisch, 9th ed., SI version, Wiley Pub.
